[Home](./index.md) &gt; [blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [ShortcutItems](./blockly.shortcutitems.md)

## ShortcutItems namespace

## Enumerations

|  Enumeration | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [names](./blockly.shortcutitems.names.md) | Object holding the names of the default shortcut items. |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [registerCopy()](./blockly.shortcutitems.registercopy.md) | Keyboard shortcut to copy a block on ctrl+c, cmd+c, or alt+c. |
|  [registerCut()](./blockly.shortcutitems.registercut.md) | Keyboard shortcut to copy and delete a block on ctrl+x, cmd+x, or alt+x. |
|  [registerDelete()](./blockly.shortcutitems.registerdelete.md) | Keyboard shortcut to delete a block on delete or backspace |
|  [registerEscape()](./blockly.shortcutitems.registerescape.md) | Keyboard shortcut to hide chaff on escape. |
|  [registerPaste()](./blockly.shortcutitems.registerpaste.md) | Keyboard shortcut to paste a block on ctrl+v, cmd+v, or alt+v. |
|  [registerRedo()](./blockly.shortcutitems.registerredo.md) | Keyboard shortcut to redo the previous action on ctrl+shift+z, cmd+shift+z, or alt+shift+z. |
|  [registerUndo()](./blockly.shortcutitems.registerundo.md) | Keyboard shortcut to undo the previous action on ctrl+z, cmd+z, or alt+z. |
